<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="arduino_functions" id="QWW|$jB8+*EL;}|#uA" deletable="false" x="27" y="16">
    <statement name="SETUP_FUNC">
      <block type="init_serial_monitor" id="`u}m?XO4n0OfM-#Lkv}_">
        <field name="SERIAL_ID">SerialUSB</field>
        <field name="SPEED">9600</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <statement name="LOOP_FUNC">
      <block type="sensebox_interval_timer" id="O9v0AEoK)S$@d^H(}),V">
        <field name="interval">500</field>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="print_serial_monitor" id="ZHinsK5;0-dw8HT,e~uX">
            <field name="SERIAL_ID">SerialUSB</field>
            <field name="NEW_LINE">TRUE</field>
            <value name="CONTENT">
              <block type="sensebox_sensor_pressure" id="f3kfFiq?7/NaHo}!R/[e">
                <mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" name="Temperature"></mutation>
                <field name="NAME">Temperature</field>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="arduino_functions" id="QWW|$jB8+*EL;}|#uA" deletable="false" x="27" y="16">
    <statement name="SETUP_FUNC">
      <block type="sensebox_display_beginDisplay" id="Ot[9l,WFZ%2al!y0v#[b">
        <next>
          <block type="init_serial_monitor" id="m~2yIQiLRIaZB,J;a:9)">
            <field name="SERIAL_ID">SerialUSB</field>
            <field name="SPEED">9600</field>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <statement name="LOOP_FUNC">
      <block type="sensebox_interval_timer" id="JG}~_ZNnA+Nz!bwTwU#b">
        <field name="interval">50</field>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="print_serial_monitor" id=":FMDU3+lG=?0r(U8qxai">
            <field name="SERIAL_ID">SerialUSB</field>
            <field name="NEW_LINE">TRUE</field>
            <value name="CONTENT">
              <block type="sensebox_sensor_pressure" id="0A.9y}Deb#5}xn{}C0et">
                <mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" name="Temperature"></mutation>
                <field name="NAME">Temperature</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="sensebox_display_show" id="^c]C%+Ah~R`IZhvr?UM%">
                <statement name="SHOW">
                  <block type="sensebox_display_fastPrint" id="[amiE+d:QS@,4Mel%.Wl">
                    <value name="Title1">
                      <block type="text" id="J2VVTI054_6_^cp|zMb,">
                        <field name="TEXT">Temperatur</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="Value1">
                      <block type="sensebox_sensor_pressure" id="!3k2N;;EH|1~L0FO;*|X">
                        <mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" name="Temperature"></mutation>
                        <field name="NAME">Temperature</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="Dimension1">
                      <block type="text" id="!n]auU5,@)_).K_C9?Tt">
                        <field name="TEXT"> </field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="Title2">
                      <block type="text" id="DJ3{Ubs]`xF?5$k!bP]`">
                        <field name="TEXT"> </field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="Dimension2">
                      <block type="text" id="/s1sNl1%H*|}p4V[[Sr9">
                        <field name="TEXT"> </field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </statement>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
